title: தமிழக பா.ஜ.க தலைவராக எச்.ராஜா தேர்வு; சான்றிதழ் உண்மையா?
author: tamil.factcrescendo.com
vclaim:
Heartiest Congratulations to Sri @nalinkateel as He formally takes over as BJP Karnataka President.



We are confident that BJP will reach greater heights under the leadership of humble & hardworking Sri Nalin who has years of experience as Karyakarta.#StatePresidentNalinKateel pic.twitter.com/DJsgFhbkXV
